description: A PortUp trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in an
agent role, has detected that the jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus
object for one of its communication links left the down state
and transitioned into some other state (but not into the
notPresent state). This other state is indicated by the
included value of jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVccpPortUp JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortAdminStatus i 1 JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus i 1 JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation s EXAMPLE

description: Indicates the actual admin status of this
vccp port, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortAdminStatus

description: Indicates the actual operational status of this
vccp port, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member model.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member location.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation

description: A PortDown trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in an
agent role, has detected that the jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus
object for one of its communication links is about to enter the
down state from some other state (but not into the
notPresent state). This other state is indicated by the
included value of jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVccpPortDown JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortAdminStatus i 1 JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus i 1 JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation s EXAMPLE

description: Indicates the actual admin status of this
vccp port, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortAdminStatus

description: Indicates the actual operational status of this
vccp port, which is typically but not limited to, a
function of the state of individual segments of
this port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisPortOperStatus

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member model.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member location.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation

description: A MemberUp trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in an
agent role, has detected that the Member present at the location
jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation on one of the Virtual
Chassis left the down state and transitioned into some other
state (but not into the notPresent state).

event.Summary: $v2 VCCP member $v1 is up; Model: $v3; Location: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVccpMemberUp JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberSerialnumber s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberRole i 1 JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation s EXAMPLE

description: Serial number of the virtual-chassis member.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberSerialnumber

description: Specifies whether the virtual-chassis member is of the type:
master(1), backup(2), linecard (3)
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberRole

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member model.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member location.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation

description: A MemberDown trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in an
agent role, has detected that the Member present at the location
jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation on one of the Virtual
Chassis is about to enter the down state (but not into the notPresent
state).

event.Summary: $v2 VCCP member $v1 is down; Model: $v3; Location: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVccpMemberDown JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberSerialnumber s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberRole i 1 JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberLocation s EXAMPLE

description: Serial number of the virtual-chassis member.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberSerialnumber

description: Specifies whether the virtual-chassis member is of the type:
master(1), backup(2), linecard (3)
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberRole

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member model.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VIRTUALCHASSIS-MIB::jnxVirtualChassisMemberModel

description: Specifies the virtual-chassis member location.
